name: Sign-In with Ethereum Buttons 2.0.0
description:
Sign-In with Ethereum (SIWE) is a new form of authentication that enables users to control their digital identity with their Ethereum account and ENS profile instead of relying on a traditional intermediary.


Learn more about the project at https://login.xyz


These buttons were created as a resource for developers building SIWE and those integrating SIWE into their own projects.
